rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell that’s white, blue, black, or green, put a +1/+1 counter on Hesitant Vanguard.
Surpass {5}{R} [i]({5}{R}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you cast a spell that’s white, blue, black, or green, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
